alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 07 at 1:24AM PST until March 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches...except for higher amounts of 10 to 20 inches over above 2500 feet elevation in southern Josephine and eastern Siskiyou Counties. For the Winter Weather Advisory, 1 to 3 inches of snow expected. * WHERE...For the Winter Storm Warning, western and southern Josephine and eastern Curry counties and the Illinois Valley. This includes Selma, Cave Junction, and O`Brien. For the Winter Weather Advisory, this includes northeast Josephine and eastern Curry County, including Grants Pass, Wilderville, Murphy, and Sunny Valley. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 AM PST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 4 PM Tuesday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will lower to around 1000 feet overnight, then will fluctuate between 1500 and 1800 feet Tuesday afternoon before lowering again Tuesday evening and night. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. * A Winter Storm Warning means that severe winter weather is imminent and poses a threat to life and property. Take protective action now.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
